question: It is easier to roll a barrel full of coal tar than to pull it because
option1: the full weight of the barrel comes into play when it is pulled
option2: the rolling friction is much less than the sliding friction
option3: more surface area of the barrel is in contact with the road when it is pulled
option4: coal tar is a liquid and it flows in the barrel when it is rolled
answer: the rolling friction is much less than the sliding friction
